dcterms:creator: Z. Luo
F. Branchaud-Charron
C. Lemaire
J. Konrad
S. Li
A. Mishra
A. Achkar
J. Eichel
P.-M. Jodoin
dcterms:description: The MIO-TCD dataset is the largest public benchmark for object detection in traffic surveillance images, containing 110,000 images for training and 27,743 images for testing. It allows participating teams to upload their test results to an evaluation server to obtain their detection performance.
dcterms:title: MIO-TCD

dcterms:creator: K. Behrendt
L. Novak
R. Botros
dcterms:description: The Bosch Small Traffic Lights dataset presents a unique challenge for detecting small objects with partial occlusions, containing 5,093 training images and 8,334 testing images.
dcterms:title: Bosch Small Traffic Lights

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI Object Detection dataset has 7,481 training images and 7,518 testing images, providing a comprehensive set of real-world and challenging computer vision tasks including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, object detection, and tracking.
dcterms:title: KITTI Object Detection
